channel.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
channel.description:
I know that they don't use combat since my levels didn't change, Note that my bank was completely empty before this occured this is how i found it after a 2m order:
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1fizh0.png[/img]

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

TheBeanie:

Is it worth buying an account from them? I have a lvl 92 but i really cba leveling it or anything so im thinking buy a lvl 110+ and transfer my items over?

risky, most get recovered lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

TheBeanie:

Soooo Any thoughts on buying an account?

Some people havent had good transactions with them in the past so I dont know if you should do it. When I bought gold from them it took over a month to get it to me because they never responded to emails but eventually they told me they were low on funds. It was only 1m too.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:24, topic:356147”]This just came into my head, I set up a bot here a couple years ago to pick up bones and bury them.

RuneScape Wiki

Boneyard

The Boneyard is a location found in level 19-23 Wilderness that has four spawns of Big bones and ten of normal bones. Level 32 Skeletons patrol the area, but for those who can defend themselves against these skeletons, it is an effective place to...

What if they take your account to somewhere like that with really fast respawns of something worth a decent amount of gp, pick them up on your account, and just sell them to their other account that’s sitting there. People do the same thing with blue dragon scales, and considering big bones are 676 gp each at the moment, this wouldn’t be half bad.[/quote]
Doesn’t exist anymore.

Read full topic

What if they take your account to somewhere like that with really fast respawns of something worth a decent amount of gp, pick them up on your account, and just sell them to their other account that’s sitting there. item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Frell:

Stand exactly where you were before you handed the char off to them and follow them. keep pchat on when you give it to them and when they first log on youll see the world for a second.

you can turn private chat off from the lobby.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

They change your password so that in case your account is banned for RWT or w/e, Jagex can look back and see that your password was changed by another IP, it makes it look like it was stolen. At least that’s what I was able to gather from one of the support people at g2gmart, lol.

And to transfer I think they do the same thing they do in p2p, just find a f2p item that’s crashing, buy a lot of it in GE for min on your account, sell it to theirs at med price and repeat.

& did you check your GE history? I’ve seen topaz and jangerberries in mine before after they were on it

Edit;

goatee:

Add yourself?

They turn private chat off. They’re very secretive O_O

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Easy as fuck to find out, make a new char and ask them for 1m again, and follow them around without really following them.

Very interested, report back to base so we can expose their secret.

item.title: Gold4rs's f2p method?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“I james I, post:8, topic:356147”]ollie, like 5 hours, its dirt cheap gold, how do they do it, when i ordered it, some chinese lady rung me up to confirm it.

There service is very professional, this is how i was notified via email:

"Thank you for your order！

I am writing to notice you that we have completed your order now.

Please log on your account and check it. By the way, the new password of your account is passhere . Please send us an email when you have confirmed your order is right. At last, please don’t forget to change your code，but do not change back to the beginning one ,which you used provide to us in order to theft.

If you have any questions about the order, please come to our website www.gold4rs.com and have a talk with us on live chat or call us at: 1-203-901-1860.

Best wishes for you.

Sincerely yours,

gold4rs.com "[/quote]

They could at least hire someone who knows English…

Read full topic
